plot: BoJack goes off the grid and winds up at his grandparents' dilapidated home in Michigan where he reflects on his family legacy and befriends another soul haunted by the past.

BoJack seems to be alone, leaving California. However, after seeing his mother on a sugar packet. He goes to the Sugarman house to stay there. He ends up having to get tools to fix things in the house and manages to make a friend. They start rebuilding the house to what it originally was. They successfully complete it.
